author: chinthaka
msg: Introducing Texts to contain QNames directly.
Now one can directly create a Text giving a QName or call OMElement.setText(QName).

author: costin
msg: A minimal set of files to debug and launch tomcat inside eclipse.
I assume the 'real' config files will be in the /res or in some /share directory,
so it should be possible to leave /conf for ide debugging.
